    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env;

    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Resource AS Resource;
    6: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk AS Main;
    7:
    8: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/auth.php');
    9: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/Cli/main.php');
    10: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/Model/Http/main.php');
    11: include_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/Set/cli.php');
    12:
    13: const MODIFIER_DELIMITER = ':';
    14: const PATH_DELIMITER = DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR;
    15: const NAMESPACE_DELIMITER = '\\';
    16:
    17: /**
    18: * Basic environment variables object
    19: * @return Object $def Object [ 'method', 'path', 'request', 'settings' ]
    20: */
    21: function Def() {
    22: return (object)[
    23: 'method' => Env\Model\Http\Method(),
    24: 'path' => paths(),
    25: 'request' => Env\Model\Http\Attributes(),
    26: 'settings' => DefSettings()
    27: ];
    28: }
    29:
    30: /**
    31: * Path environment variables object
    32: * @return Object $def Object [ 'resources', 'root', 'root_url' ]
    33: */
    34: function DefPaths() {
    35: return (object) [
    36: 'resources' => Resource\paths(),
    37: 'root' => false,
    38: 'root_url' => false
    39: ];
    40: }
    41:
    42: /**
    43: * Settings environment variables object
    44: * @return Object $def Object [ 'auth', 'config', 'required', 'route', 'template', 'template_vars' ]
    45: */
    46: function DefSettings() {
    47: $req = Resource\Def();
    48:
    49: return (object) [
    50: 'auth' => Auth\Required(),
    51: 'config' => ($req && property_exists($req, 'config'))
    52: ? $req->config : false,
    53: 'callback' => ($req && property_exists($req, 'rc'))
    54: ? Resource\Set\Callback((object) $req->rc) : false,
    55: 'required' => ($req && property_exists($req, 'rc'))
    56: ? Resource\Set\Required((object) $req->rc) : false,
    57: 'route' => ($req && property_exists($req, 'route'))
    58: ? $req->route : false,
    59: 'template' => ($req && property_exists($req, 'rc'))
    60: ? $req->rc : false,
    61: 'template_vars' => ($req && property_exists($req, 'template_vars'))
    62: ? $req->template_vars : false
    63: ];
    64: }
    65:
    66: /** Return array value from GET object
    67: * @param String $attribute_name
    68: * @return Mixed $value || Array $get
    69: */
    70: function Get(String $name = NULL) {
    71: return ($name)
    72: ? Env\Model\Http\Param($name)
    73: : Env\Model\Http\Data()->get;
    74: }
    75:
    76: /** Environment variable object [Def()]
    77: * @return Object $def
    78: */
    79: function Info() {
    80: return Def();
    81: }
    82:
    83: /** Return environment parameter value by key
    84: * @param String $name
    85: * @return Mixed $value || false
    86: */
    87: function Param(String $name = NULL) {
    88: $val = Env\Model\Http\Attributes();
    89: return ($name && property_exists($val, $name))
    90: ? $val->$name
    91: : false;
    92: }
    93:
    94: /** Return environment path value by key
    95: * @param String $name
    96: * @return Mixed $value || false
    97: */
    98: function Path(String $name = NULL) {
    99: $val = paths();
    100: return ($name && property_exists($val, $name))
    101: ? $val->$name
    102: : false;
    103: }
    104:
    105: /** Command line identifier constant
    106: * @return String $str
    107: */
    108: function cli_domain() {
    109: return '__CLI__';
    110: }
    111:
    112: /** Command line protocol constant
    113: * @return String $str
    114: */
    115: function cli_protocol() {
    116: return 'file://';
    117: }
    118:
    119: /** Verify Command line
    120: * @return Bool false || true
    121: */
    122: function is_cli() {
    123: $host = Env\Model\Http\Host();
    124: return ($host == cli_domain()) ? true : false;
    125: }
    126:
    127: /** Utility to provide a log file.
    128: * @param String $message
    129: * @return Bool false
    130: */
    131: function log(String $msg) {
    132: date_default_timezone_set("America/Chicago");
    133: $log = (Main\Get(Main\CUSTOM_LOG))
    134: ? Main\Get(Main\CUSTOM_LOG)
    135: : Main\app_log();
    136:
    137: $msg = date("Y.m.d h:i:sa").": $msg\n";
    138: return error_log($msg, 3, $log);
    139: }
    140:
    141: /** Return updated DefPaths object
    142: * @return Object $paths
    143: */
    144: function paths() {
    145: $obj = DefPaths();
    146: $obj->root = Main\app_path();
    147: $obj->root_url = (Param('offset') === '')
    148: ? PATH_DELIMITER
    149: : Param('offset').PATH_DELIMITER;
    150:
    151: return $obj;
    152: }
    153:
    154: /** Utility to generate a uuid (alias to uuidv4)
    155: * @param String $data Seed data for generating (Must be 15 characters or more in length.)
    156: * @return String $uuid
    157: */
    158: function uuid(String $data=NULL) {
    159: return uuidv4($data);
    160: }
    161:
    162: /** Utility to generate a uuid (v4)
    163: * @param String $data Seed data for generating (Must be 15 characters or more in length.)
    164: * @return String $uuid
    165: */
    166: function uuidv4(String $data=NULL) {
    167: // Generate 16 bytes (128 bits) of random data or use the data passed into the function.
    168: $data = $data ?? random_bytes(16);
    169: assert(strlen($data) == 16);
    170:
    171: // Set version to 0100
    172: $data[6] = chr(ord($data[6]) & 0x0f | 0x40);
    173: // Set bits 6-7 to 10
    174: $data[8] = chr(ord($data[8]) & 0x3f | 0x80);
    175:
    176: // Output the 36 character UUID.
    177: return vsprintf('%s%s-%s-%s-%s-%s%s%s', str_split(bin2hex($data), 4));
    178: }
